document: {"blocks":[{"key":"70g1m","text":"1. Late P0/early P1 mice were sedated by hypothermia until anesthetized, and 1 μl of plasmid DNA mixed with Fast Green Dye was injected into the lateral ventricle of one hemisphere using a pulled glass pipette (Drummond). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8o2af","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eelg3","text":"2. For shRNA knockdown experiments in wild-type CD1 mice, the 1 μl of DNA contained 1 μg of pGLAST-PBase and 1 μg of pPB-shRNA-mCherryCAAX was injected. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2m4c7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"331ap","text":"3. To label astrocytes in WT and LRRK2 G2019Ski/kimice, the 1 μl of DNA contained 1 μg of pGLAST-PBase and 1 μg of pPB-mCherry-CAAX was injected per mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":45,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1685f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cf5k","text":"4. For PALE-mediated overexpression of phospho-mimetic EZRIN in shRNA knockdown experiments, 0.5 μg pGLAST-PBase, 0.5 μg pPB-shRNA-mCherryCAAX, and 1 μg pZac2.1-GfaABC1D-Ezrin T567D-BioID2-HA were injected in a total volume of 1 μl. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mf98","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjb5s","text":"5. For phospho-dead EZRIN overexpression in WT and LRRK2 G2019Ski/kimice, 0.5 μg pGLAST-PBase, 0.5 μg of pZac2.1-gfaABC1D-mCherry-CAAX and 1 μg of pZac2.1-GfaABC1D-Ezrin T567A-BioID2-HA were injected in a total volume of 1 μl. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":63,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er23a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4e1a","text":"6. Following DNA injection, electrodes were oriented with the positive terminal above the frontal cortex and the negative terminal below the chin, and 5 discrete 50 ms pulses of 100 V spaced 950 ms apart were applied. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kcq1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnbok","text":"7. Pups were recovered on a heating pad, returned to their home cage, and monitored until collection at P21. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m5lv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dieg9","text":"8. The number of mice used for each experiment is indicated in the figure legends. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdr7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkcgu","text":"9. All animals appeared healthy at the time of collection. Brain sections were examined for the presence of electroporated cells before staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Postnatal astrocyte labeling by electroporation (PALE)
